1.description:
Hello applicants
We are in need of two Data Mining Associates for immediate hire. This would be a full time, temporary, non-exempt, hourly position for approximately two months or until project completion. Hours will be 9am-5pm, Monday through Friday. Must work on site, cannot work from home. 
Responsibilities: These positions would be responsible for labeling and tagging a large amount of data. No specialized knowledge is necessary, need to be quick and detail-oriented with basic computer skills.
Requirements: In order to be considered for the job please submit a cover letter, containing a short bio, and your resume. High school diploma is a must in order to be considered. Thank you.

4.description:
Summary
This is a part-time gig for someone at a moderate forex trading level.  If you are brand new, this is not for you.  I am looking for a partner to day-trade forex markets during the American business hours starting at 8am.  I would trade from 9pm Asia, through Europe till 8am and pass the account to you and give you a written briefing.  I have a profitable unique quantitative strategy, with more details below.  
You’d be kicking in your own money into an account with my money and we’d split the profit.  I need a partner because I cannot handle the long hours by myself.   Below is information about me, the strategy, and what would be required of you.
What would be required of you
This assumes you are passionate about Global Macro and forex.  If you’re not already interested in being a trader, this isn’t going to work.  I am also expecting you’ve traded forex before for at least a few months, and are familiar with a lot the basics.
You can expect to make 10-20% on money you put into an account that we share.  Right now, I aim to make $150-200 per day, with a couple of days of having to sit out.  On a sit out day, you’d have to do nothing.
I am looking for a partner in the New York City/Tri-state area.  I live in New Jersey right across the George Washington bridge and I would have to meet you.  We would have to trust each other because you’d have access to my account and my P&L would reflect your decisions.
Hours
You’d be required to work 8am to 11am and occasionally in the afternoon as well if it’s a busy day. 
The trading day is broken up into 4 sections:
-Asian (9pm – 2am) –  I’d handle this
-European (2am to 8am) –  I’d handle this
-American morning (8am to 11am)  - You
-American afternoon (11am to 4pm) – Sometimes You, Usually Nothing and we sit out
About Me
I question the structure of our economic system and don’t agree with a monetary system based on debt.  This view of  fractional reserve banking would be classified as Austrian economics but I’ve added many of my own ideas upon the existing framework of Austrian authors.  My photo next to my economics reading is on this post  and you can find my writings at GlobalMacroForex.com
I’ve been trading spot forex and equity indexes for 2 years with live money, but reading a lot before.  My focus is on G7 Western Europe, America, Japan, and China.
About the Strategy
This is not technical analysis.  And it’s not fundamental, if you define fundamentals as government numbers or information from the news.  Instead, I have unique perspective on what drives markets and essentially, I am trading bank liquidity.  Nobody trades like me, so it’s hard to label it for you.
My “formulas” or ideas are ways of assessing bank supply, demand, and cycles.  Utilizing data scrapped off the internet and publicly available data from both government and private sources, my strategies give a view into the most probable scenarios on a 1-3 day timeframe.  It’s not a single data point, but a combination of objective formulas and ideas that mean certain outcomes.
This strategy combines some elements of rules based systematic thinking with discretionary implementation.  Each trade has an objective pre-defined minimum requirements, but which of the many trade choices that met the minimum or how long the trade is held is discretionary.

6.description:
We are a Human Capital enterprise platform looking for a Software Engineer, Full-Stack/Technical Partner. We are offering ultimate flexibility. We are based in CA with an office in NY. Own your schedule as long as milestones are met. 
We have a clear market fit and are validated. We have numerous letters of intent and have already been approached for funding. We will start actively raising funds when the product is built. Our founding team is made up of former FAANG talent. 
Heres what to expect
- Work from anywhere for 30+ hours a week. If you want to work from a shared space, we'll set you up. During these hours we expect you to be able to communicate quickly, effectively and be fully engaged with the team the rest of the product team.
-  Full stack web/mobile application development with a variety of languages including but not limited to PHP, JavaScript, HTML, Reactjs, react-native, css etc. 
-  You'll be building our iOS MVP based on exact designs that are already created. The heavy lifting is done.
-  Implement web or mobile interfaces 
-  Work closely with our founders and design teams to execute on designs and feature specifications and build the first generation of our product leveraging frameworks such as React & React Native
- Build report interfaces and data feeds
Qualifications
- 5+ years of previous work experience or B.A. or M.Sc. in Computer Science or related field
- Experience with mobile development
Compensation: 
Very generous equity compensation 
Salary once investors get on board
Milestone Stipends until we receive investment
Please respond by email with a resume and LinkedIn profile.

9.post_title: WORK FROM HOME: Gaming Startup Seeks JavaScript Engineer
9.description:
Who we are
Devium Games is an early-stage startup focused on gaming companion apps with real-time communication. Our unique team is seeking a talented senior front-end developer to help design, develop, and deploy our first release. 
We are a 100% distributed team working quickly and efficiently to build responsive apps with powerful, reusable components. We practice self-organization, team prioritization, and lean methodologies. We are experienced professionals with decades of success in the areas of tech, marketing, and software design. 
Who you are
You are a front-end developer with a solid working knowledge of data structures who can help us solve challenging interactions between our server and client. You’ll be joining a very small team working to build and release a new application, and will impact both the front-end and back-end architecture. You have a wide knowledge of front-end development, from UX best practices to REST API integration. You are comfortable making big choices with long-lasting impact, and working in a variety of disciplines.
Responsibilities
Build out full feature sets for the Devium Games platform using the VueJS framework
Design, develop, and deploy complete components using VueJS.
Able to make key architectural decisions for a front-end application, especially with regards to Firebase and peer-to-peer communication.
Able to contribute to user interaction discussions, and aware of best practices for mobile and desktop.
﻿Qualifications
4+ years of experience
Demonstrated experience in client-side scripting and web application frameworks (Angular, React, Vue, or other)
Experience with and understanding of single-page applications and REST-based architectures
Experience working with Firebase
Strong knowledge of HTML5, CSS3 / SCSS, JavaScript / Typescript
Good knowledge of UX/UI best practices
Preferred Specializations
Gaming. You're as comfortable with a controller in your hands as you are with code on your screen.
Sports. Athletes, competitors, team players preferred. You understand the itch to win. To get better. To compete. To prepare.
People. You have a natural sense for relationship-building, and you take pride in building strong friendships. You are careful with your criticism and generous with your praise. 
Bonus Points
Describe a Singleton Pattern.
Describe your greatest sports moment.
What is a Nickle Blitz?

17.description:
Job Description For Lead Manager
POSITION
This is an amazing opportunity to learn the amazing world of real estate investing.
I’m a busy real estate investor and I do A LOT of marketing that generates calls from property owners that would like for me to purchase their property
Here’s how you can help me
• Listen to and transcribe the voice mail messages from property owners and input the information into our CRM
• Researching the property information left on the message by the property owner and add the information and details to our CRM
• You’ll also help me in preparing documents that are needed for the process of buying and selling the properties that I find. I’ll also need you to spend some time on the phone …...
• There are property owners that don’t leave enough information on their message, so you will call them and follow a simple script to ask them for details about their property.
• There are property owners that call in to our phone system… listen a pre-recorded message BUT instead of leaving a message they will just simply hang up and not leave a message. You’ll dial them and ask them if they have a property for sale.. If they do you’ll follow a simple script to gather the information and input the data into our CRM system.
• You’ll be following up on leads that I may have spoken with a few months back and you’ll call to find out if there is still an interest in selling their property.
This is NOT sales position.
You will not be required to sell or convince the property owners to sell their property or do business with us.
You’ll simply be a friendly voice that will ask them a series of questions so that our internal sales team can contact them.
REQUIREMENTS
There are a few MUST haves for us
• Friendly - you must come across as warm and friendly so that the customer can feel comfortable providing us with the necessary information about the property.
• You must type at least 50 words per minute - there is a lot of information that you’ll be typing as you listen to the voice mail messages and speak with the customer. So typing speed is a must have for us
• You like being on the phone and speaking with people - you’re going to be on the phone a lot during the day and so you have to be ok with that
• Team player - you’ll be a very important part of our real estate team and so you’ll need to work with the various other team players
• Highly organized - you’ll be working inside of our CRM and managing the leads and scheduling calls to follow up with them, so it’s important that you be organized
• Able to communicate orally and in writing in both english. If you have knowledge of Russian language - it is welcome
• Flexible - being a team player means that you’ll pitch in as needed with other task that the team will need help with
• High Speed Internet Connection - goes without saying that you should have a fast internet connection.
• Excellent Written English and Attention to Detail - You have to able to communicate extremely well in the written word and have absolute accuracy on documents you will prepare. This means structure, proper use of
nouns and adjectives, etc. Your ability to communicate precisely using the written word is very important.
• Pleasing personality - You well be interacting with clients, customers, and various business partners. So having a pleasing personality is a MUST. That means you are outgoing and positive when on the phone with people.
• It would be a BIG PLUS (but not 100% necessity) if you were bilingual (English / Russian).
COMPENSATION
This is an hourly position PLUS bonuses.
This position will begin as an hourly position and if all works out well, you’ll have an opportunity to earn bonuses for every deal that you help us purchase.
If the goal is for you to help us with 8-10 properties a month, this could mean a substantial bonus for you
All payments including bonuses would be done via card.

23.post_title: eBay Seller Expert for new startup - Remote
23.description:
EBAY SELLER EXPERT
Are you an online marketplace reseller geek?  Do you love buying and selling USED items? We are looking for you!  
We are a rapidly growing, seed-stage startup working on the next big thing in re-commerce based in California. We're looking for remote eBay selling experts with strong communication skills.
This is a key role suited to experienced marketplace sellers looking to work with a small dynamic team to help develop a new online platform.   This position requires strong writing skills, a self-starting attitude and a passion to help make the world a better place. Full-time, part-time, local and remote positions available.  
MUST be available to work weekends. 
Qualifications:
eBay seller with at least 50 positive feedbacks as a Seller (Top Rated Seller preferred)
Experience selling on multiple online marketplaces like eBay, Poshmark, Depop, Mercari or Etsy a strong plus.
Experience selling second-hand fashion.
Experience pricing eBay items with research tools like Terapeak or Worthpoint.
Strong understanding of eBay selling policies and procedures
Familiar with the importance of keywords in titles and descriptions
Knowledgeable about eBay search optimization
Fast accurate data entry skills
Excellent spelling, grammar, and written English language skills
Packing and shipping knowledge
Ability to write a description based on photos of products quickly and accurately
Knowledge of American pop culture helpful
Flexible and able to thrive in the ever-changing environment of a start-up
Responsible, dependable and willing to work under deadlines
Good interpersonal skills and a sense of humor!
Please respond with a resume and your eBay seller's account ID. 
You will not be considered without submitting both of these items.
Note: you will NOT be selling items under your own user ID. 
We look forward to hearing from you!

27.post_title: Experienced IT On-Site Field Technician Needed
27.description:
Techies 4 U, Inc. is looking to recruit a Field Engineer (IT Support Technician) to support a variety of clients throughout the Indiana region. The primary supporting locations are flexible as we have clients all around Indiana. We are looking for Field Engineers with hands on experience in the IT field or the knowledge and capability to support on-site IT work with no training.
Technicians will be able to dispatch from their home location and will not be required to come into an office, but may be required to come in periodically for admin responsibilities, tool transfers, etc.
High Level understanding of IT Rooms, Systems, and Computers is a requirement.
A working vehicle is a requirement as travel to each client site (most of the time multiple sites per day) is a requirement. Mileage is reimbursed.
Technicians should know how to perform the following tasks:
1. Terminate Copper cabling (Cat5e, Cat6)
2. Properly run copper cabling
3. Perform IT break/fix - resolve computer problems
4. Knowledge of Switches, Firewalls, Routers, WIFI devices
5. How to properly dress and clean up cabling
Knowledge in the following fields is a plus, but not required:
1. Fiber Cabling Work including termination
2. Experience installing Ladder racks
3. Full IT Telecom room setup
4. Experience installing structure cabling in large warehouse / factory environments
5. OSHA Safety Certifications
6. Boom Lift and Hydraulic Lift Certifications
7. NVR Security Installation experience
8. POTS line / 66 block experience
9. VOIP installations Experience
We are looking for a long term contract commitment and quickly promote our technicians upon completion of certain milestones with our company. Our company believes that our front line, customer facing engineers are the base of our company's success.
Perks:-
1. Hours are flexible, there are many positions available-
2. You can dispatch from your home.
We need someone with a knack for Troubleshooting. New problems come up everyday, so we don't always have an immediate answer to resolve the issues. We need problem solvers who can work the issue down to the root cause and then present a resolution.
All these are things you should have a basic understanding of:-
-Basic Cabling Knowledge (CAT 5, CAT6, Termination, What a 66 block is, what a Patch panel is, what a patch cable is, what a continuity test is.- Basic Switch / Networking Knowledge (Brands and Quirks - Juniper, Cisco, Dell, Etc., How they fit in a rack, what the different ports on the front or back are for).
- Cable Management (enterprise) experience (How to manage rack, ladder rack, and retail setting cabling professionally with ties, neat and clean.)
- OS troubleshooting experience (windows & mac, for this you really, basically, just need to know how to use google..)
- POS experience (Most of this will be on-site learning, but check out some of the different POS systems like Aloha, IBM, PAR, etc. - these are basically just custom cased all in one touchscreen computers - not expected that you will have experience with these, but if you do, that will help move you up the list.)
- Basic IT Hardware knowledge (Switch, Rack, Ethernet, RJ45, RJ11, IP address, DNS, Firewall, Modem, Router, Enterprise Router, Fiber cabling, punchdown tool, network crimper, cable tester, etc,)
- CMD line experience (ipconfig commands are the majority of what we use here, but occasionally some other ones come into play; basically just know how to get to a command prompt and navigate)
- Console Cable experience (basically just know how to plug in a cable to a switch, but google how to telnet or use putty if you want to learn more on this -
- Security Camera / System installation & Management a plus (Know the difference between a network camera - Ethernet Cabling - and BNC camera - Siamese Cabling - and how the two are setup)
- Knowledge of basic router setup and port forwarding / DNS setup a plus (Basic networking - know the difference between a modem and a router and their functions
Please have your own basic network Tools. Anything you do not have will be provided as required, but if you have your own tools, this will help move you up the list.
Raises are provided on a yearly basis and additional raises may come earlier depending on your skill and customer satisfaction levels. Bonuses and sales commissions may be included periodically if you are able to sign up / upgrade clients for varied promotions or contracts.

The engineer can summon a turret

36.post_title: Are you an internet sleuth?  - Sourcing Gig (Remote) - $17/hour
36.description:
Are you detail oriented? Are you efficient with a computer?
We're looking for someone to follow a specific process to qualify potential leads for us. This means working through a list of names, looking up their graduation date and degree and denoting whether or not they meet acceptance criteria. The next phase is using an email finder tool and other research methods to find this person's email address and other contact information so we can get in contact with them.
This will start at 20-30 hours of work if criteria are met. If this gig goes well there are other tasks we could use help with in supporting this process.
This gig is 100% remote, and with the exception of a few brief check-ins per week, the hours are completely flexible. You will invoice us for hours, and you will get paid so long as you meet our minimum for leads qualified per hour.
To apply:
- Reply to this post with a pdf of your resume and a few things that will test your ability to succeed in the role:
- 1 story that depicts how detail oriented you are
- The contact information of Dr. Sanjay Gupta (Yes, the one on CNN): a business mailing address, a social media profile contact, and extra credit to those who get an email address
- The email address that you would use to pitch Mark Cuban an investing idea that’s not sports related.
Pay:
$17/hour

39.post_title: Web App Developer for ios and android project
39.description:
ExecutiveLeadersRadio.com is the leading business radio show in the MidAtlantic States (interviewing 700+ CEOs each year, on 160 terrestrial and internet radio stations). We've begun helping these CEOs in a wide variety of industries with their video productions.
Example of projects we need you to take on:
1) Create a thin web app (desktop, mobile, tablet) that can automatically reset a smartphone's video control to 1080, landscape and facilitate a reliable upload to us.
2) ExecutiveLeadersRadio.com and ExecutiveLeadersVideo.com is setting up a "Technology Advisory Panel" where CEOs and/or their teams can discuss upcoming technologies - and we are looking for the right technical person to help manage this panel.
Requirements:
· Minimum of 4 years professional experience.
· Must have a proven track record of real world app development
· Must have strong organizational and time management skills
· Able to communicate technology to laypeople
· Knowledgeable about video technology and equipment
· Confident in ability to master new challenges.
Must be located in the Continental US
Compensation: $45 an hour
This project will start immediately with the intention of expanding our relationship for the long-term.
Interested? Send us your resume.

41.description:
Currently looking for a developer to work with on projects. This would be a remote based situation.
Looking for someone proficient, but i am almost completely self-taught myself, so i am willing to work with someone who is hungry to get experience and learn, but you have to have some knowledge and some chops.
Looking for someone proficient in taking PSDs to interactive front end development. Optimized. Responsive. etc. Custom/from scratch experience. Wordpress experience.
Looking for someone proficient in programming. PHP/MySQL. Jquery. Json. Etc. Custom/from scratch experience. Wordpress experience.
Must have experience and access to Adobe CC.
This is a remote based situation, so good online communication skills and availability are needed to make sure things stay on track throughout the project life cycle, etc. Email, Slack, Skype, etc.
Rate will depend upon level of experience and proficiency, and the type of work.
This is an opportunity to work with a seasoned senior level marketing professional on a range of projects. To collaborate, experiment, develop custom solutions. Grow in your skillsets and marketability while making some money. And hopefully to develop an ongoing working relationship that is mutually beneficial.
Had to step down for almost 2 years due to a health scare. Now i am rebuilding. Lots of industry contacts, etc. Work is starting to flow again, and i could use some assistance.
Fluency of work, in the beginning may be a little touch and go until some momentum is generated. So this would be best suited for someone looking to supplement their current income or for a freelancer who already has some work of their own and are looking to add some new projects and experience to their portfolio.
Best way to contact me to get things started would be email. A copy of a resume and portfolio of some work would be necessary.
UPDATE: Thank you to those who have submitted responses. I am working my way through the responses, but will be running this ad to the end of its duration (which should be another week or two), at that time i will begin responding. Thanks again.
